definition: to reveal/to display/to show/to exhibit sth
to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition

sentences.english: This article shows you how to create a user registration form from beginning to end.
sentences.chinese: 本文向您展示了創建用戶註冊表單的全過程。

sentences.english: Plastic bottles and buckets, even the sole of a shoe are all on display.
sentences.chinese: 塑料瓶和塑料桶，甚至還有鞋底都在那裏展示。

sentences.english: The company showed the prototype of the new model at the exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 公司在展覽會上展示了這種新模型的原型。

sentences.english: I showed him a wide selection, and quickly he picked out a pair.
sentences.chinese: 我給他展示了許多款選擇，很快他選種了一對。

sentences.english: He hopes to write reports in English to support the exposure of his hometown to the rest of the world.
sentences.chinese: 他希望通過英文文章向世界展示自己的家鄉。

sentences.english: The section diagrams are meant to show two levels of information in the cut.
sentences.chinese: 這個剖面圖意在展示切面的兩個層的信息。

sentences.english: How did you think about"Luxe Pack in Green" area?
sentences.chinese: 您認爲“奢侈品包裝的綠色革命”特區的展示如何？

sentences.english: Reading these same stories mythologically, however, can bring forth their universal qualities.
sentences.chinese: 然而，這些相同的神話故事也展示了他們的普遍特徵。

sentences.english: I chose three of them to show all of you a full view.
sentences.chinese: 我選了當中的三張以展示完整的外觀給您們大家看。

sentences.english: I'm going to show you one last technique.
sentences.chinese: 我要給你展示最後一項技術。

sentences.english: In here, from the slash-and-burn cultivation to the high tech agriculture, obtains the demonstration.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏，從刀耕火種到高科技農業，都得到展示。

sentences.english: Beutiful photos and very powerful representation of a great Nation.
sentences.chinese: 漂亮的圖片，這也是對一個大國的強有力的展示。

sentences.english: The thesis mainly demonstrates the securitization from the perspective of Cross-Border.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要從跨國性的視角向讀者展示資產證券化。

sentences.english: However, Rock Financial Showplace might also prove to be too small for the international show.
sentences.chinese: 然而，巖財務展示也可能被證明是太小，國際查看。

sentences.english: That particular screenshot mentioned shows off a visceral fight between Marauders and Immortals.
sentences.chinese: 這張截屏展示了掠奪者和不朽者的激烈戰鬥。

sentences.english: 10 a.m. - Head over to the Urban Planning Exhibition Center, a six story building, situated on People's Square.
sentences.chinese: 參觀位於人民廣場的上海城市規劃展示館。

definition: to come out/to emerge/to reveal/to display
to put on display/to be on show/to exhibit
to appear/to emerge/to present (a certain appearance)/to demonstrate
to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition
to present clearly/to give prominence to/to magnify/clear and obvious
to create/to build/to develop/to forge (of metal)
